price: na nanggugulo sa lupa at hindi nagsasaayos.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يُفۡسِدُونَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَا يُصۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yuf'sidūna fī al-arḍi walā yuṣ'liḥūna
